name: HORNYBAROVSK
description:
It's time to implement the worst possible business plan — a BDSM club in Khabarovsk. Take on the role of the only employee of a BDSM club and try to save your institution from ruin in the first week of work. Satisfy sadomasochists, bind lustful fat men, pour liters of wax on ladies, and sell the most bizarre rubber products to your customers.

ART: ankorra, qeeki
GD: soviet_toad
CODE: letallan
